snippet: On Friday, High Line Art, the public art program of the New York park built on a historic elevated rail line, announced its plans for its spring 2012 season.
abstract: On Friday, High Line Art, the public art program of the New York park built on a historic elevated rail line, announced its plans for its spring 2012 season.

headline.main: High Line Art Announces Spring Lineup
headline.print_headline: Spring Art on the High Line
